QuestData.Title: Oath of Shadow Hunter Rala
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: New to the rank of Blademaster, Na'Shra is a formidable warrior and master of arms.
QuestData.RewardText: My sista have other duties, but I have leave of ol' Vol'jin to extend my services to you.$b$bYa proved your worth, and did a task that needed doing.$b$bI be followin' ya, boss-mon, if ya be willing.
